column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh:------ A luxury Audi car hit the road divider in front of the Ministry of Interior. This happened at 3:00 am local time on April 4
column5: Khan Chamkar Morn.------According to the source
column9: was being driven by a (*quote) beautiful girl  from north to south.------When reaching the front of the Ministry of Interior building
column10: the luxury car ploughed head on into the concrete
column11: causing almost complete damage to the vehicle.------The beautiful girl then disappeared
column12: leaving the car at the scene.------After the incident
column13: the traffic police came to take the car away
column14: waiting for the owner to settle according to the legal procedure.------TVFB
